hero.text1: Mastering the Fusion of Art, Code, and Light

about.title: AI ARTIST
about.subtitle: Brazilian Creative Director & AI Specialist
about.p1: With a career built between advertising and post-production, he is among the first professionals to integrate AI in a practical way into real commercial productions — uniting direction, technology, and visual language within a single creative process.
about.p2: His projects represent a concrete shift from experimentation to the traditional market, bringing hybrid AI solutions to campaigns broadcast on television and other major media platforms. With a technical eye and narrative sensitivity, Lenox uses artificial intelligence as an extension of creative thinking, developing new ways to produce, compose, and imagine moving images.

skill1.title: AI Creative Concept environment
skill1.description: High-quality visual creation with generative models. Precise control of light, color, and texture for campaigns, from concept to final frame.

skill2.title: Advanced Post-Production
skill2.description: Hybrid pipelines combine classic techniques and AI to accelerate workflows, provide clean upscaling, and maintain aesthetic fidelity.

skill3.title: Custom Solutions
skill3.description: On-demand engineering: templates, presets, and automations that reduce rework and maintain consistency across teams and suppliers.

skill4.title: Workflows for agencies and clients
skill4.description: Scalable operations with AI: multi-format deliveries, reduced lead time, and integration with teams and partners.
